title: PolitiFact - Did transportation projects create more than one-third of all stimulus jobs?
subtitle: U.S. Rep. Peter DeFazio didn’t care for President Barack Obama’s stimulus package in 2009 -- he said it contained too ma
author: www.politifact.com
vclaim: Says only seven percent of 2009’s stimulus bill went toward transportation projects, yet they created over one-third of the bill’s total jobs.
